''In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana,'' Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence has been publicly pondering whether to run for the governor's office or for president for several months.
